title: Time is gold

comments.author: MainIbem
comments.body: Quote from: Time is gold on August 08, 2023, 01:41:48 AMüîªüîªAirdrop Linküîªüîªhttps://t.me/LadyPepeMemeAirdropBotAirdropbot are one of the worse airdrop someone should think of participating as during my airdrops days I have never earned any single token through botz. How legit does the airdrop seems to be and there is no clear information about this airdrop.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: MainIbem on August 08, 2023, 08:45:16 PM...How legit does the airdrop seems to be and there is no clear information about this airdrop.Here the problem is different: this is another clone of the Pepe coin and, accordingly, you do not need to count on the fact that you will be able to get at least a minimal profit. In any case, only the "project" team will receive a profit, since the main amount of coins is in their wallets.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: On their homepage, they already made a disclaimer Quote$LPEPE is a meme coin with no intrinsic value or expectation of financial return. There is no formal team or roadmap. the coin is completely useless and for entertainment purposes only.This is to warn investors that it's not worth investing in their token, this is very rare for a developer to claim that their token is useless, others will shill to high heaven that they are the biggest thing to happen in Cryptocurrency since they already claimed that their token is worthless we don't need to waste our time on this useless token.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: What a hell, I just track through the website and I noticed it was so empty and what surprises me is how come they had such amount of followers on twitter does it mean they are all bots followers because I didn't find anything that is so attracting (Lack of information) in the website for someone to look and consider this project for investment maybe wanting to devote their time to involved in their airdrop campaign.Well airdrop hunters don't mind in as much as they have some free tokens in their wallet they are always satisfied with it.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: MainIbem on August 08, 2023, 08:45:16 PMHow legit does the airdrop seems to be and there is no clear information about this airdrop.Even with the conspicuous lack of clear information about the project and its airdrop, we still find those who will blindly participate in this fruitless chase. Greed is the major undoing of many. People want to reap where they didn't sow and that's how these projects get to find those who believe in whatever they're told.Quote from: Adbitco on August 09, 2023, 09:15:09 AMwhat surprises me is how come they had such amount of followers on twitter ...It could've been bought. Don't rule out that possibility. Many projects look for already grown accounts and purchase them to run their newly created businesses. Sometimes they buy old accounts to make it look like they've been old in the business. It's all deceit and those who they hoodwink are in themselves greedy folks.

comments.author: Cryptoababe
comments.body: Anyone doing this airdrop should know that its just a waste of time. Even the most hyped meme coin on BSC never stop to dip.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Quote from: Mpamaegbu on August 14, 2023, 06:03:30 PMQuote from: Adbitco on August 09, 2023, 09:15:09 AMwhat surprises me is how come they had such amount of followers on twitter ...It could've been bought. Don't rule out that possibility. Many projects look for already grown accounts and purchase them to run their newly created businesses. Sometimes they buy old accounts to make it look like they've been old in the business. It's all deceit and those who they hoodwink are in themselves greedy folks. Now I see!Meaning before one could go into such altcoin investment some info needs to be digged out to know their origins, ¬†and does it mean they got those old tweet deleted to basically keep their account clean from suspicion and those who go about hunter for a project to double there money may not know what the interior motives of the project owners. Airdrop isn't something to be fully trusted because they are sucking, I could remembered a friend who got piped up though airdrop and till then he promised never to involved with anything airdrop.

comments.author: Godday
comments.body: That's why I've always disliked meme coins. Because they are definitely shitcoins. I'm not surprised that people are interested in meme coins because they see SHiba and Doge who have gone into the blue chips. But that is a 1/10000000 chance. How could you risk your money on something like that?

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: Adbitco on August 15, 2023, 06:45:52 AMQuote from: Mpamaegbu on August 14, 2023, 06:03:30 PM~Now I see!Meaning before one could go into such altcoin investment some info needs to be digged out to know their origins, ¬†and does it mean they got those old tweet deleted to basically keep their account clean from suspicion and those who go about hunter for a project to double there money may not know what the interior motives of the project owners.You nailed it. Criminals don't like leaving trails. Whenever you find a trail it could simply mean that either someone in the gang fucked up or the criminal(s) just want to lead pursuers astray. In cryptos, it's the first case. The criminals get hold of those accounts by hacking or buying them and then do their deed. Why do you think old accounts are hacked or bought?QuoteNow I see!Airdrop isn't something to be fully trusted because they are sucking, I could remembered a friend who got piped up though airdrop and till then he promised never to involved with anything airdrop.By "piped up" you meant scammed/wrecked? Anyway, the safest way to attend to airdrops is to dedicate a burner wallet for them. No one should use their main wallet for airdrops or any other social media tasks to avoid getting their funds wiped out if it goes awry because of malware or hacks. Anything can happen. Be guarded.
